name: Steamed Hams, but it's RPGMAKER2003!
description:
Originally released in 2019 

I saw a bunch of rpgmaker games based on the Steamed Hams meme,
and was bummed that none of those games used footage from 
the show... so I decided to take a shot at it. 

It's not very funny... but it was difficult to put together in rpgmaker2003.



Programs used:
Cherry's new picture-in-battles feature (included in rpgmaker2003)
hedge1's spritesheet creator (turns animated gifs into sprite sheets)
CCE to convert videos for use in rpgmaker2003. (Win 98 - WinXP only)
